title: Miami-Dade County, Florida
summary: Miami-Dade County is a county located in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of Florida. According to a 2019 census report,[6] the county had a population of 2,716,940,[7] making it the most populous county in Florida and the seventh-most populous county in the United States.[8] It is also Florida's third largest county in terms of land area, with 1,946 square miles (5,040Â km2). The county seat is Miami, the principal city in South Florida.[9]
